subtitle: Multiplayer Sudoku, No Ads
description:
Race your friends in real-time Sudoku battles! Free for a limited time.

Challenge others on the same board with the same timer – may the fastest solver win. Or solve solo at your own pace. Clean interface, zero ads, pure focus.

• Real-Time Multiplayer
Compete side-by-side or remotely on the same puzzle. Fair game, same timer. See who solves it first.

• Solo Play
Relax and solve at your own pace. No pressure, just you and the puzzle.

• Zero Ads, Zero Interruptions
No full-screen ads breaking your concentration mid-puzzle. No surprise data usage from ad networks. No paywalls or overpriced "remove ads" options. One fair price, yours forever – no subscriptions, no coins, no pop-ups.

• All Skill Levels
Easy, medium, or hard puzzles. Perfect for beginners or Sudoku masters.

Clean, fast, and distraction-free. This is Sudoku done right.
whatsNew: Experience Sudoku without distractions. No ads, no in-app purchases, no interruptions – just pure puzzle solving. We've also improved the playing experience with small adjustments to the game board.
promotionalText: Limited time: Now free for all of 2026! No ads, never any in-app purchases, no interruptions – just pure puzzle solving.
